languages.text: {n}Офицеры почтительно молчат, но по мягким улыбкам видно, что сомнение в промысле Императора веселит их.{/n}
{n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры почтительно молчат, но по мягким улыбкам видно, что сомнение в промысле Императора веселит их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

{n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales que te rodean mantienen un silencio respetuoso, pero puedes deducir por sus leves sonrisas que la mera idea de dudar de la providencia del Emperador les resulta absurda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales que te rodean mantienen un silencio respetuoso, pero puedes deducir por sus leves sonrisas que la mera idea de dudar de la providencia del Emperador les resulta absurda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}周囲の士官たちは信心深く沈黙を守っているが、かすかに聞こえる笑い声から、彼らが皇帝の摂理を疑うこと自体を馬鹿げていると感じていることがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}周囲の士官たちは信心深く沈黙を守っているが、かすかに聞こえる笑い声から、彼らが皇帝の摂理を疑うこと自体を馬鹿げていると感じていることがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管你周围的军官保持着恭敬的沉默，但从他们脸上微弱的笑意可以看出，他们认为怀疑帝皇启示的行为实在是太荒唐了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你周围的军官保持着恭敬的沉默，但从他们脸上微弱的笑意可以看出，他们认为怀疑帝皇启示的行为实在是太荒唐了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die umstehenden Offiziere schweigen respektvoll, doch du merkst an ihrem schwachen Lächeln, dass sie den bloßen Gedanken, an der Vorsehung des Imperators zu zweifeln, für absurd halten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die umstehenden Offiziere schweigen respektvoll, doch du merkst an ihrem schwachen Lächeln, dass sie den bloßen Gedanken, an der Vorsehung des Imperators zu zweifeln, für absurd halten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si les officiers rassemblés autour de vous observent un silence respectueux, vous comprenez à leurs sourires entendus qu'ils trouvent totalement absurde la seule idée de douter de la providence de l'Empereur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si les officiers rassemblés autour de vous observent un silence respectueux, vous comprenez à leurs sourires entendus qu'ils trouvent totalement absurde la seule idée de douter de la providence de l'Empereur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etrafındaki subaylar, sessizliklerini hürmetkârca koruyor. Ancak belli belirsiz gülümsemelerinden İmparator'un takdiriilahisinden şüphe etme fikrini bile absürt bulduklarını anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officers around you keep a respectful silence, but you can tell by their faint smiles that they find the very idea of doubting the Emperor's providence absurd.{/n}
